title: Tea
description: Tea cultivation is primarily carried out in regions with tropical and subtropical climates, requiring well-drained, acidic soils and consistent rainfall.

title: Coffee
description: Coffee cultivation thrives in tropical regions with rich, well-drained soils, moderate temperatures, and regular rainfall.

title: Coconut
description: Coconut cultivation is prominent in tropical coastal regions, with countries like the Philippines, Indonesia, India, and Sri Lanka being major producers.
